an4.4:4.1: “When a foolish, incompetent bad person acts wrongly toward four people they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.
an4.4:4.4: father … a Realized One … and a disciple of a Realized One.
an4.4:4.5: When a foolish, incompetent bad person acts wrongly toward these four people they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.
an4.4:5.1: When an astute, competent good person acts rightly toward four people they keep themselves healthy and whole. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much merit.
an4.4:5.4: father … a Realized One … and a disciple of a Realized One.
an4.4:5.5: When an astute, competent good person acts rightly toward these four people they keep themselves healthy and whole. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much merit.”
an4.4:6.3: or a Realized One, a Buddha,
an4.4:7.3: they’re criticized in this life by the astute,
an4.4:7.4: and they pass on to rebirth in a place of loss.
an4.4:8.3: or a Realized One, a Buddha,
an4.4:9.3: they’re praised in this life by the astute,
an4.4:9.4: and they depart to rejoice in heaven.”
